page.syntax: Output_String as C = DECRYPT_STRING(C String[,C Key])

argument.name: String
argument.description: A character string encrypted by the ENCRYPT_STRING()function.

argument.name: Key
argument.description: An encryption key. Required, if used by the corresponding ENCRYPT_STRING() function.

page.description: Decrypt a string given Encrypted string.
page.discussion: DECRYPT_STRING() returns a plain text version of a character string encrypted by the ENCRYPT_STRING() function.
page.example: ? encrypt_string("Alpha Software") = "$Z)kd*ky+B#1@" ? encrypt_string("Alpha Software", "password") = ">jYM?_Po?w'js5" ? decrypt_string("$Z)kd*ky+B#1@") = "Alpha Software" ? decrypt_string(">jYM?_Po?w'js5", "password") = "Alpha Software"
